creditline: The Raymond and Ruth Reister Endowment for Art Acquisition and the Mary Ruth Weisel Endowment for Africa, Oceania, and the Americas
description: rust-colored hide, with cowrie shell edging; pale blue, green and dark blue beads fringed and clustered across the top of apron; conch shell crosses at PR and PL; clusters of wooden beads with thing glass beads hang from C; no heavy metals were detected on the leather (testing completed by MACC 12/15/2022).
medium: Hide, cowrie shells, woody seeds or seed pods, and glass beads
title: Apron
